text: Paparazzi is a do it yourselfPaparazzi - The Free Autopilot and open- sourceOssif: le micro-drone en open source de l'Enac prend son envol micro Unmanned aerial vehicle. Created in 2003, paparazzi is developed in the laboratories of the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university). Paparazzi system allows to fly one or more micro-UAVs independently, with a GPS or controlled by a Linux ground station. Paparazzi has acquired a world-renowned in the field of micro-UAVs, for its technical qualitiesFrench school to go it aloneLes élèves de l’Enac récompensés pour la construction d’un drone de surveillance and its the cost, relatively low concerning the components needed to manufacture the system.Projekt "Paparazzi" Bau dir deinen fliegenden Spion ==References== ==Other websites== * Official wiki Category:Drones Category:French aircraft
title: Paparazzi Project
